Break the Third Soul

(Armor Negating [armornegating], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Air Breathers Only [aironly], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The Camazotz of Xibalba practice a magic tradition that teaches that a person has four souls; blood, bone, breath and shadow. This spell damages the soul of breath making the target fatigued.
